description: This file defines a Kotlin object 'StringUtils' providing utility functions 'join' and 'split' that work with a custom 'LinkedList' class, delegating the actual implementation to 'JoinUtils' and 'SplitUtils' respectively.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Concatenates elements of a LinkedList into a String using JoinUtils.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList of substrings using SplitUtils.
